questions.question: I am at the airport and my bag has been derouted, can I obtain a reimbursement?
questions.outcome_justification: In the event that the air carrier fails to deliver the Insured's Baggage to the airport of arrival resulting from the ticket, the Company shall indemnify the Insured for the fixed and predetermined amount stated in the policy certificate and established at the time of purchase of the policy.
questions.payment_justification: The Insured Person may choose from the following reimbursement options the amount payable to him/her in the event of the materialization of an indemnifiable claim. The Indemnification option selected and operative will be only the one resulting in the policy certificate according to the following: Indemnity amount for baggage loss Option 1 € 150,00 Option 2 € 350,00 Option 3 € 500,00

questions.question: I am traveling with my family, they stole all our bags from our rented car, will the insurance reimburse the value of what stolen?
questions.outcome_justification: The insurance contract is valid and operative only if it has been recalled on the policy sheet and the relevant premium has been paid. In the event that the air carrier fails to deliver the Insured's Baggage to the airport of arrival resulting from the ticket, the Company shall indemnify the Insured for the fixed and predetermined amount stated in the policy certificate and established at the time of purchase of the policy. The Baggage must have been duly checked in by the Insured and delivered to the Check-in Desk of the air carrier for boarding in the hold.

questions.question: I got a precious handbag stolen while in a bar in  Paris, with mobile phone and documents in it, can you help me with the costs I'll have to bear?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: - state of war, revolution, riots or popular movements, looting, vandalism, strikes; - acts of terrorism; - earthquakes, tsunamis, tidal waves, floods, volcanic eruptions and other atmospheric phenomena declared natural disasters as well as phenomena occurring in connection with energy transformation or settling of the atom, whether natural or artificially caused; - willful misconduct or gross negligence of the Policyholder or Insured; - bankruptcy or insolvency of the Carrier, travel organizer or any supplier; - Quarantines or lock-downs. The Insured's Hand Baggage and all baggage not delivered to the Carrier at the time of Check-in are also excluded.

questions.question: I had dinner at our the resort yesterday, and I had an awful night with pain in the stomach and diharreha, I want to see a doctor, can you send one to our hotel?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy document provided does not address medical coverage, emergency treatment, or hospitalization.

questions.question: My daughter had an accident by bike and needs to see a doctor. We are in Amsterdam, shall we advance the payment of the hospital?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context provided does not address medical coverage or accidents occurring abroad.

questions.question: My daughter had an accident by bike and needs to see a doctor. We are in Tokyo, is the insurance going to anticipate the costs?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context provided does not address medical coverage or accidents occurring abroad.

questions.question: I am traveling alone, my business partner had a hearth attack and I have to go back home. Will you reimbuse the rest of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The insurance is valid in the country where the Insured suffered the accident that originated the right to the benefit, it being understood that the settlement will take place in Italy and any sums paid out will be in euro currency.

questions.question: I am traveling with my family, my business partner had a hearth attack and we have to go back home. Will you reimbuse the rest of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: - state of war, revolution, riots or popular movements, looting, vandalism, strikes; - acts of terrorism; - earthquakes, tsunamis, tidal waves, floods, volcanic eruptions and other atmospheric phenomena declared natural disasters as well as phenomena occurring in connection with energy transformation or settling of the atom, whether natural or artificially caused; - willful misconduct or gross negligence of the Policyholder or Insured; - bankruptcy or insolvency of the Carrier, travel organizer or any supplier; - Quarantines or lock-downs.

questions.question: My business partner had a hearth attack and I can't leave any more. Will you reimburse the cost of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: This policy covers the non-delivery of baggage by the air carrier.

questions.question: I had to be in Mayorca for 15 days, but after 5 days my mother in law had a health issue and I have to go back home, will you reimburse the rest of my holidays?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context provided does not address reimbursement for unused holiday time due to personal or family emergencies.

questions.question: My mother in law had a health issue and I can't leave any more. Will you reimburse my trip?
questions.outcome_justification: This policy covers 'Compensation for Non-Delivery of Baggage' and does not address health issues or trip reimbursements.

questions.question: (Cruise) My son twisted and akle at the swimmingpool, and won't be able to walk out of the cabin for 2 days, have we got the right to a reimbursemet?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context provided does not address coverage for injuries or accidents occurring at a swimming pool during a cruise.

questions.question: We had a car accident in the USA, and my hausband broke a leg. We are now in the hospital. We gave the name of the insurance at check in, up to what amount will you cover?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context provided does not address medical coverage or accidents occurring abroad.

questions.question: My aunt died yesterday, we shall leave on holidays tomorrow, but obviously we need to attend the funeral and deal with family issues, will the insurance reimburse us?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: - state of war, revolution, riots or popular movements, looting, vandalism, strikes; - acts of terrorism; - earthquakes, tsunamis, tidal waves, floods, volcanic eruptions and other atmospheric phenomena declared natural disasters as well as phenomena occurring in connection with energy transformation or settling of the atom, whether natural or artificially caused; - willful misconduct or gross negligence of the Policyholder or Insured; - bankruptcy or insolvency of the Carrier, travel organizer or any supplier; - Quarantines or lock-downs.

questions.question: I my 2 years old kid has a cold, and we can't leave any more, will you reimburse our tickets?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy does not address reimbursement for non-departure due to illness.

questions.question: Our flight was late in Dubai and we have missed the coincidence for Tokyo, the next flight will be in 10 hours. Will you reimburse us the lounge or a day hotel?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: - Quarantines or lock-downs.

questions.question: We had to leave for Toronto with American Airlines today, but our flight was cancelled. We will need to take the next fight depending on availability. Will you pay for an upgrade in case only more expensive tickets are available?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy covers 'Compensation for Non-Delivery of Baggage' and does not mention coverage for flight cancellations or upgrades.

questions.question: My flight landed 3 hours late in Sao Paulo, will you reimburse us?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: - state of war, revolution, riots or popular movements, looting, vandalism, strikes; - acts of terrorism; - earthquakes, tsunamis, tidal waves, floods, volcanic eruptions and other atmospheric phenomena declared natural disasters as well as phenomena occurring in connection with energy transformation or settling of the atom, whether natural or artificially caused; - willful misconduct or gross negligence of the Policyholder or Insured; - bankruptcy or insolvency of the Carrier, travel organizer or any supplier;  - Quarantines or lock-downs.

questions.question: I have an existing patology that got incredibly worst during the last days, I am afraid I won't be able to leave. Will the insurance reimburse my trip?
questions.outcome_justification: This policy does not address trip reimbursement due to medical conditions.

questions.question: (Cruise) I have an issue at work and need to stop my 2 weeks cruise in advance. Will I be reimbursed of the remaining days?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context provided does not address cruise-related issues or cancellations.

questions.question: We are in Mexico, and we had an alarm at our place, maybe there was a robbery. Will you reimburse the damage?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: - state of war, revolution, riots or popular movements, looting, vandalism, strikes; - acts of terrorism; - earthquakes, tsunamis, tidal waves, floods, volcanic eruptions and other atmospheric phenomena declared natural disasters as well as phenomena occurring in connection with energy transformation or settling of the atom, whether natural or artificially caused; - willful misconduct or gross negligence of the Policyholder or Insured; - bankruptcy or insolvency of the Carrier, travel organizer or any supplier; - Quarantines or lock-downs.

questions.question: I am traveing in India with my wife and two kids. My wife's uncle died yesteday, and we must wrap-up and go back (he was very close to us), will the company reimburse us for the expenses of changin tickets, so that we can be present to his burial?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: - state of war, revolution, riots or popular movements, looting, vandalism, strikes; - acts of terrorism; - earthquakes, tsunamis, tidal waves, floods, volcanic eruptions and other atmospheric phenomena declared natural disasters as well as phenomena occurring in connection with energy transformation or settling of the atom, whether natural or artificially caused; - willful misconduct or gross negligence of the Policyholder or Insured; - bankruptcy or insolvency of the Carrier, travel organizer or any supplier; - Quarantines or lock-downs.

questions.question: We are traveling in India, a massive flood has blocked us here, and we are supposed to take our flight back home tomorrow. Realistically, we won't be able to move before a couple of days. Will the insurance assume the additional costs?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: - earthquakes, tsunamis, tidal waves, floods, volcanic eruptions and other atmospheric phenomena declared natural disasters as well as phenomena occurring in connection with energy transformation or settling of the atom, whether natural or artificially caused;

questions.question: (Cruise) My hausbad had a stroke during the cruise, we are now in Athens, in the hospital, but the ship has gone. Will you reimburse us and pay for the hospital and for the flights back to Rome?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context provided does not address medical emergencies, hospitalization, or travel-related medical expenses.

questions.question: (Cruise) We are traveling in the Caraibe, but our neighbour called that there's a water leak in our appartment. We can't do much, but as we will be back in 5 days, it might be too late. Can you send someone?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context provided does not address issues related to water leaks in apartments or any property damage occurring while the policyholder is away.

questions.question: (Cruise) We are supposed to leave in two days, but my son broke his wrist playing basketball. We wish to move our reservation of one month, will you help us with the additional costs?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context provided does not address coverage for changing travel reservations or covering additional costs due to a family member's injury.

questions.question: We are a group of 5 leaving in 2 days. One of us had a bad accident and won't make it. With us, we have his girlfriend that doesn't wont to come without him. Will the company refund the travel expenses for both of them?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: - state of war, revolution, riots or popular movements, looting, vandalism, strikes; - acts of terrorism; - earthquakes, tsunamis, tidal waves, floods, volcanic eruptions and other atmospheric phenomena declared natural disasters as well as phenomena occurring in connection with energy transformation or settling of the atom, whether natural or artificially caused; - willful misconduct or gross negligence of the Policyholder or Insured; - bankruptcy or insolvency of the Carrier, travel organizer or any supplier; - Quarantines or lock-downs.

questions.question: We are a group of 5 leaving in 2 days. One of us had a bad accident and won't make it. Without him, we don't feel like leaving. Will the company refund the travel expenses for all of us?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy does not address travel expenses or refunds for travel cancellations.

questions.question: I am at the airport in New York with my family and my bag was shipped to Dubai. Do I have the right to a refund from the insurance?
questions.outcome_justification: In the event that the air carrier fails to deliver the Insured's Baggage to the airport of arrival resulting from the ticket, the Company shall indemnify the Insured for the fixed and predetermined amount stated in the policy certificate and established at the time of purchase of the policy.
questions.payment_justification: Indemnity amount for baggage loss Option 1 € 150,00 Option 2 € 350,00 Option 3 € 500,00

questions.outcome_justification: In the event that the air carrier fails to deliver the Insured's Baggage to the airport of arrival resulting from the ticket, the Company shall indemnify the Insured for the fixed and predetermined amount stated in the policy certificate and established at the time of purchase of the policy.
questions.payment_justification: Indemnity amount for baggage loss Option 1 € 150,00 Option 2 € 350,00 Option 3 € 500,00

questions.question: We are a group of 20, we have just landed in Sao Paulo, but 4 of our team (two couples of coleauges) have to leave back due to urgent matters at work. Will the company reimburse their trip?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: - Quarantines or lock-downs.

questions.question: We are a group of 20, we have just landed in Sao Paulo, but 4 of our team (two couples of coleauges) have to leave back due to the death of the uncle of one of them. Will the insurance reimburse their trip?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: - Quarantines or lock-downs.

questions.question: I am traveling to Japan and had a stop in Dubai with my family of 4. Our flight arrived in Dubai 4 hours later. Although we didn't miss the conicidence with our flight to Tokyo, will the insurance contribute for the discomfort?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: - state of war, revolution, riots or popular movements, looting, vandalism, strikes; - acts of terrorism; - earthquakes, tsunamis, tidal waves, floods, volcanic eruptions and other atmospheric phenomena declared natural disasters as well as phenomena occurring in connection with energy transformation or settling of the atom, whether natural or artificially caused; - willful misconduct or gross negligence of the Policyholder or Insured; - bankruptcy or insolvency of the Carrier, travel organizer or any supplier; - Quarantines or lock-downs.

questions.question: We had a car accident in the USA, and a person in the other car broke a leg. The other car claims that it is our fault. Will the company cover the expenses?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context provided focuses on insurance for non-delivery of baggage by an air carrier and does not address car accidents or liability for injuries to third parties.

questions.question: We are in the mountains and I tried to do paragliding. When landing I had an issue with my right ankle and had to go to the hospital. Will the insurance reimburse me?
questions.outcome_justification: This policy specifically covers 'Compensation for Non-Delivery of Baggage' and does not mention coverage for personal injuries or medical expenses.

questions.question: We were sailing in the Caribean, and my daughter had a hit of boom on her head, we had to bring her to the hospital in St Lucia. The hospital is private and seems expensive, will the insurance reimburse the expenses?
questions.outcome_justification: This policy specifically covers 'Compensation for Non-Delivery of Baggage' and does not address medical expenses or accidents occurring during travel.

questions.question: I was in Jerez de la Fronteira doing Kyte surf, I have lost control and ended up on a large buoy. I am now at the hospital. Will the insurance cover the expenses?
questions.outcome_justification: This policy specifically covers 'Compensation for Non-Delivery of Baggage' and does not address medical expenses or incidents occurring abroad.

questions.question: We have reserved for our family of 6, but my hausband has an awful backpain, he has already gone through surgery for this. We won't be able to leave. Will the company reimburse the trip for the 6 of us?
questions.outcome_justification: This policy is for 'Compensation for Non-Delivery of Baggage' and does not cover trip cancellations due to medical conditions.

questions.question: We have reserved for our family of 6, but my hausband has an awful backpain. We won't be able to leave. Will the company reimburse the trip for the 6 of us?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: - state of war, revolution, riots or popular movements, looting, vandalism, strikes; - acts of terrorism; - earthquakes, tsunamis, tidal waves, floods, volcanic eruptions and other atmospheric phenomena declared natural disasters as well as phenomena occurring in connection with energy transformation or settling of the atom, whether natural or artificially caused; - willful misconduct or gross negligence of the Policyholder or Insured; - bankruptcy or insolvency of the Carrier, travel organizer or any supplier; - Quarantines or lock-downs.

questions.question: I am escalading the Everest and my Sherpa and they have dropped my baggage by in a deep, where it cant' be retrieved. Can you reimburse it?
questions.outcome_justification: The insurance contract is for 'Indennizzo per Mancata consegna del Bagaglio' (Compensation for Non-Delivery of Baggage) and covers the risk of non-delivery of the Insured's luggage by the air carrier at the airport of arrival resulting from the ticket in his or her name and duly delivered at check-in at the time of departure.

questions.question: Sport team of 18 football players. We booked a trip to Girona for our international tournement. Two of the players won't come because they had an accident playing last week (5 days ago). Can you reimburse their flghts and hotel rooms?
questions.outcome_justification: The insurance is valid in the country where the Insured suffered the accident that originated the right to the benefit, it being understood that the settlement will take place in Italy and any sums paid out will be in euro currency.
